title: what happend to unskilled report, stupid report, selfish coward report?
body:
is playing like a noob not a problem anymore?

no need to even explain it, we all seen it, we know what it is. we breath air (oxygen among others), we can't see it but we know it's there. so don't tell me "who are you to decide what unskilled means", how about a report option for being stupid?, can we be realistic humans again?, instead of fearful mothers who wanna protect their children making them weak in the process..

even the word "noob" is not allowed, how low have we fallen. when I was a kid we would beat the shit out of noobs, not protect them, we MADE MAN OUT OF BOYS! but that's Korea for you..
